testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Join hundreds of businesses that have transformed their customer communication

reviews.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
reviews.text: Wup.chat reduced our appointment no-shows by 40% and improved patient satisfaction significantly. The HIPAA compliance gives us peace of mind.

reviews.name: Carlos Rodriguez
reviews.text: Our guest satisfaction scores increased by 35% since implementing Wup.chat. The multilingual support is phenomenal for our international guests.

reviews.name: Maria Santos
reviews.text: We've doubled our reservation bookings and reduced wait times. The AI understands our menu perfectly and makes great recommendations.
